screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xnc file in Ucamco Reference Gerber Viewer
screenshot.caption: XNC file open in Ucamco Reference Gerber Viewer

description: The XNC format is compact and streamlines the CAD to CAM process with no requirement for additional sidecar files. The format stores multiple commands on separate lines, with each line in the file representing a single command. There is no limit of commands that can be stored in an XNC file but commands must be upper case. XNC files also contain metadata that may include the span of the drill holes, whether the drill hole is a mechanical or component hole, or if the drill hole is plated.

images.caption: XNC file open in Ucamco Reference Gerber Viewer
